key.name: token
key.description: A GitHub personal access token with the "notifications" scope. Generate one at https://github.com/settings/tokens

key.name: domain
key.description: The GitHub hostname. Only change this if you use GitHub Enterprise.

key.name: refresh-interval
key.description: How often to poll GitHub for new notifications. GitHub's API enforces a minimum of 60 seconds via the X-Poll-Interval header.

key.name: show-alert
key.description: Show a desktop notification when new GitHub notifications arrive

key.name: show-participating-only
key.description: Only show notifications where you are directly participating (mentioned, review requested, assigned, etc.)

key.name: hide-widget
key.description: Hide the panel indicator when there are no unread notifications

key.name: hide-notification-count
key.description: Hide the number next to the GitHub icon in the panel
